titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4) to declare it to be the policy of the United States to deploy a national missile defense.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4 with 2 hours of general debate. Motion to recommit with or without installowed. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-69, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 30.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 120.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 185 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/17/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4 (U.S. policy to deploy a national missile defense).
